reviews.review: Very good game. Never gets old.

This game is still a good shooter and even better with friends to hop on. There are many ways to enjoy csgo: you play the game, you trade with skins or you gamble :)
Eventho cheaters are sometimes your enemy but overall the game is still playable
Jag rekomenderar detta spel för det är mycket spänning och ett roligt spel att spela med kompisar.
Investing a few minutes into downloading a cheat is more worth it, then training for years.

When ever I launch the game, the game keeps running in the background and all I see is the game frozen in the main loading bit where it says CS:GO but nothing happens I can interact with the game and load into a match but everything else is frozen...

Es puta mierda

UPDATE: Steam me recuerda que puedo modificar mi opinión al haber vuelto a jugar a CS:GO, así que aprovecho para decir que sigo pensando que es una puta mierda, y que el sistema antitrampas de valve apesta
Кусок говна , а не игра, понижение за большой винстрайк и один луз, не играйте в это говно

Zajebista giera
PSYCHA PRZY NIEJ SIADA
É muito interactivo o jogo, recomendo!!!

yes, yes a very good game. I have wasted 1 000 hours of my entier life and I still enjoy the game more than my girlfriend.

used to be a great game. valve completely ruined it and now it's one of the worst games in my library. terrible game, honestly not even worth the amount of space it takes up on your drive. used to love this and i played it every day. now i'd rather play fucking fortnite.
